article_text:
Sex & Relationships

You Start Losing Friends At This Age

Apparently, your friendship circle starts to shrink at a certain age. The bad news: It's a lot sooner than you might have expected. According to a study from the Finland's Aalto University School of Science and Oxford University’s Department of Experimental Psychology, both men and women start to lose friends when ...

Ally Hickson

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Hayley MacMillen
article_metadata.description: The 2016 presidential candidates have a lot to say about you, your body, and your future. You can respond — with your vote.

og.description: When someone tells me they aren’t sure whether they’ll vote in the presidential election, I get annoyed. When they say it’s because they don’t know enough, I get depressed. (Strangely, this statement seems to come from the women in my life far more than the men; men’s reasons for not
